price: 46. То boye osengaki bango lifuta to osengaki bango bazua nyongo ya monene?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
